ai_features_description: Explore our artificial intelligence tools designed to enhance your Canadian immigration journey with accurate predictions, personalized recommendations, and smart document analysis.
eligibility_assessment_description: Our AI analyzes your profile against program requirements and provides detailed insights on your eligibility chances.
assessment_disclaimer: This assessment is provided for informational purposes only and does not guarantee approval of your application.
recommendations_description: Get personalized AI-powered suggestions to improve your immigration prospects based on your unique profile.
click_button_to_generate: Click the button to generate AI recommendations
recommendations_disclaimer: These recommendations are generated by AI and should be verified with an immigration professional.
document_analysis_description: Our AI can analyze your immigration documents for completeness and accuracy, helping you avoid common submission issues.
